title: Iran launches missile attack on U.S. base in Iraq
description: Iranian forces fired multiple ballistic missiles targeting a U.S. military base in Iraq, causing casualties and damage.

title: U.S. retaliates with airstrikes on Tehran command centers
description: The United States launched precision airstrikes targeting Iranian military command centers in Tehran.

title: Oil prices surge above $90 per barrel
description: Global oil prices spike due to escalating tensions in the Middle East, impacting global markets.
